settings.side_panel_2_content:
Free Shipping in US:

DiamAura provides complimentary expedited delivery for all orders within the United States, as well as for international orders exceeding $400 USD. All shipments from DiamAura are insured, ensuring your prized acquisition reaches you without any concerns.

Delivery Times (Once your order is completed) for US is 4-6 business days.

Please be aware: The mentioned delivery times are approximations provided by our logistics partners. Unanticipated situations and busy times may cause delays on their part.

The delivery period may differ based on the product purchased. Given that our exquisite DiamAura jewelry is custom-made, most pieces are typically dispatched within 40 Business Days.

At DiamAura, we understand that a majority of our jewelry is acquired as unexpected gifts for occasions like engagements, birthdays, and anniversaries. Hence, we employ discreet packaging which won't reveal the package's contents.

Feel free to contact us if we can assist you further in maintaining the element of surprise with your purchase!

To safeguard our clients, DiamAura provides:

1. A mandatory signature upon receipt.

2. Each order is assigned a tracking number.

3. All orders are dispatched via express mail.

4. Every order includes complimentary insurance covering the total value of your purchase.

Free 30 Days Return:

We have a 30-day return policy, which means you have 30 days after receiving your item to request a return.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition that you received it, unworn or unused, with tags, and in its original packaging. You’ll also need the receipt or proof of purchase.

If your return is accepted, we’ll send you a return shipping label, as well as instructions on how and where to send your package. Items sent back to us without first requesting a return will not be accepted.
settings.side_panel_3_content:
Avoid Contact with Chemicals
It might seem straightforward, but aggressive chemicals can gradually dull the sparkle of your diamond. Frequently washing your hands can contribute to this. Ingredients found in sunscreen, lotion, perfume, and cleaning supplies can leave a residue on the diamond, posing potential harm.

Whenever you cleanse your hands, ensure you remove your DiamAura ring. However, remember to place it in a secure location. The last thing anyone wants is to discover their ring disappearing down a sink drain or into a waste disposal unit after taking it off to wash their hands.

Understand Your Ring's Setting
Many people are unaware of their ring's specific setting, especially with rings. Understanding this setting provides better insight into its resilience against certain conditions. Some materials might withstand the continuous exposure to chemicals better than others.

For example, if your DiamAura ring is set in white gold, the potential for damage extends not only to the diamond but also affects the white gold. This could result in not only a less dazzling ring but also potential damage to the band itself.

settings.text: We understand that creating your custom size can feel daunting. But not to worry, it's actually quite easy and completely risk-free. If you're not 100% happy with your fit, we'll remake your first shirt from scratch free of charge or give your money back.

settings.title: Best Prices & Best Quality
settings.text: As we produce our own rough diamonds, we can offer exceptional prices. This eliminates the need for middlemen and allows us to offer high-quality diamond jewelry that is not only affordable but also reflective of the true value of the gem. All diamonds larger than 0.5 carat come with IGI certifications for your assurance.

settings.title: High-End Craftsmanship:
settings.text: Our inlay craftsmanship meets the standards of international high-end brands. We pay meticulous attention to every detail in the inlay process, delivering exceptional quality that matches, if not exceeds, the craftsmanship of luxury diamond brands.

settings.title: Environmentally Friendly:
settings.text: We specialize in Lab-Grown Diamonds, which are renowned for their minimal carbon footprint. By choosing DiamAura, you are embracing a greener, more sustainable future without compromising the beauty and brilliance of your jewelry.

settings.title: Ethically Sourced
settings.text: We ensure all our diamonds are ethically sourced. We take a firm stance against any form of exploitation in the diamond industry, ensuring that every gem in our collection is a symbol of love and respect for all involved in its creation.

settings.heading: Are lab grown diamonds real?
settings.content:
Absolutely! Lab-grown diamonds, like those available at DiamAura, are as genuine as their mined counterparts.

They share identical optical, chemical, thermal, and physical characteristics, with the sole difference being their origin. Lab-grown diamonds are cultivated in regulated laboratory settings that replicate the intense pressure and heat conditions found in the earth's crust, which naturally give rise to mined diamonds.

settings.heading: What is the difference between natural diamond and lab grown diamond?
settings.content: The singular distinction between a natural diamond and a lab-grown diamond lies in their genesis. Natural diamonds come into existence deep within the Earth's crust, where extreme heat and pressure facilitate their formation, which are later extracted via mining. In contrast, lab-grown diamonds are cultivated in a controlled laboratory environment, which perfectly mimics the conditions of their natural counterparts, thereby eliminating the necessity for mining. Bearing the same chemical, physical, and optical characteristics, the key difference boils down to the fact that while natural diamonds are procured through mining, lab-grown diamonds are not. This elevates lab-grown diamonds as an ethical, environmentally-friendly, and sustainable alternative, available at DiamAura.

settings.heading: Will I get a certification for lab grown diamonds?
settings.content: Absolutely! Every lab-grown diamond larger than 0.3 carat offered by DiamAura is meticulously assessed based on the four Cs: cut, clarity, color, and carat weight, and come with a certification from IGI, the foremost authority in lab-grown gemology. IGI is a widely recognized certifier for lab-created diamonds and is utilized by a significant part of the lab-grown diamond market. This fosters a grading consistency across the industry, which in turn provides customers the convenience of comparing lab-grown diamonds and ensuring they receive value for their money.

settings.heading: Are lab grown diamonds ethically sourced?
settings.content: Lab-grown diamonds, crafted in a meticulously monitored lab environment, offer a revolutionary alternative to traditional mined diamonds. There's no need to unearth them from the earth, providing a more environmentally conscious choice. This method of production not only minimizes environmental degradation but also eliminates the potential for unethical labor conditions and community displacement that can accompany mining practices.

settings.heading: What to do if I need help when purchasing an order on DiamAura?
settings.content: We are here to help! Click on the chat box below each page and we will ensure seamless purchasing experience for every customer.

settings.heading: How To Return My Items?
settings.content:
We have a 30-day return policy, which means you have 30 days after receiving your item to request a return.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition that you received it, unworn or unused, with tags, and in its original packaging. You’ll also need the receipt or proof of purchase.

If your return is accepted, we’ll send you a return shipping label, as well as instructions on how and where to send your package. Items sent back to us without first requesting a return will not be accepted.
